intro.description: You can search for words in any of your configured languages or by tag.

item.title: Choose your search Options
item.description: You can search by word or by tag.

subitem.label: Click on the language of the word that you want to search. (This will set an appropriate font in the Search for: box.) Type the word or words that you want to search for.
If you want to filter on Tags Click on the Choose button to select them. If you also typed a search word, then it will only match Test Items containing both the word and a selected tag.

item.title: Search results
item.description: The Search results should appear in the Search view. Double click on a result to open the corresponding Test Module.

item.title: Tree/Table View
item.description: You can view the results in a sortable table. Click on the small downward pointing triangle in the top right of the Search View and choose Show as List to view the items in a table rather than a tree. You can use the same menu to switch back to the tree view.
